item.title: Putting WeirdBox to SourceForge
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I just put the music player, WeirdBox, to SourceForge. Why? I have no clear idea, but putting things to a public (and reliable) place give sort of peace of mind. I wish there could be someone who’s willing to work on the project with me together. BUT, the project is not that fun 🙁
item.content:encoded:
I just put the music player, WeirdBox, to SourceForge.

Why? I have no clear idea, but putting things to a public (and reliable) place give sort of peace of mind. I wish there could be someone who’s willing to work on the project with me together.

BUT, the project is not that fun
